title: (x) Bayou Books logo - Jukebox Bookman Swash {Stephen}
content:
This is a font which seems to resemble Bookman Swash, but I can’t seem to find a variation where all of the letters are the same as the example I have attached... This is a logo that was trademarked in 1961 and now I HAVE to find the font for it somewhere. Does anyone have any suggestions?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Bayou Books scan copy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080125221252/http:/typophile.com/files/Bayou%20Books%20scan%20copy.jpg) | 102.43 KB |

 [‹ (x) Mystic Creek 'groovy' logo typeface - Midas {Ignacio (via Mark S)}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080125221252/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34424 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) square sans on Wired cover May 2007 - H&FJ Vitesse (custom face) {Andy Clymer} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080125221252/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34411 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pelican

comments.content: The [Jukebox version](http://web.archive.org/web/20080125221252/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000085) has all the glyphs except the ’k’ which you can easily build.
Thank you so much for your help!
